title: Implementation of the recommendations of the Notarial Advisory Committee appointed by the Minister of Justice
decision_details:
- The Minister of Justice has appointed Advisory Committees with the Cabinet approval to submit recommendations on the reforms to be made in the legal field. Accordingly, the proposals made by the Minister of Justice to amend the following Ordinance/Acts as recommended by the Notarial Advisory Committee so appointed, was approved by the Cabinet.	

*	The Powers of Attorney Ordinance

*	The Notaries Ordinance

*	The Registration of Documents Ordinance

*	The Revocation of Irrevocable Deeds of Gift on the Ground of Gross 	Ingratitude Act 

*	The Wills Ordinance
